programme.title: Horse Crazy Too
programme.desc: When a prize foal is stolen, two young siblings and their teenage babysitter must work together and catch the thieves before their family's ranch goes into foreclosure. A dangerous journey lies ahead, but with a little mountain magic, sometimes it pays to horse around!

programme.title: Dance Together
programme.desc: An injured dancer and a shy deaf girl overcome bullies, disability stigma, and other high school obstacles, developing a beautiful friendship amidst original and licensed songs and stunning choreography.

programme.title: A Horse Called Hope
programme.desc: A strong-willed but moody teenager Lizzy is sent to live on her grandmother’s ranch after an incident at school gets her suspended. Although reticent at first, Lizzy finally starts to unwind with the help of a nameless pony whom she calls Hope. When Lizzy learns the unfortunate news that the ranch is about to be foreclosed; she devises a plan that will not only save her grandmother’s property but also help Hope in the process.

programme.title: Beauty and The Billionaire
programme.desc: Addison gets roped into traveling overseas with her brother and his picky billionaire boss. But clashing with the billionaire is no vacation, until he starts to have a change of heart.

programme.title: Beauty and the Billionaire: Bali
programme.desc: American doctor Ivy Miller lives in Bali, working at a charitable health clinic. When a billionaire benefactor named Dylan Donnelly arrives, Ivy is less than impressed. He is only interested in making himself look better by appearing charitable. Ivy is happy when he goes on his way, but then an accident injures one of Dylan’s trusted advisors, Blake. Dylan insists Ivy stay at Dylan’s lavish estate in Bali to care for Blake until he’s well.

programme.title: Braving Rapids
programme.desc: A family goes on a river rafting trip as they process a great loss. Along the way they find a wolf pup. When some unscrupulous folks spot the wolf as well and conspire to steal and sell it, the family and guides fight to protect the pup. Could their journey to deliver the wolf safely to wildlife officials be just the thing to guide them to healing?

programme.title: Quest For Love
programme.desc: Mackenzie travels to Costa Rica for work. Her best friend Ethan comes along to get romantic inspiration for his action /adventure novel. Mackenzie has loved Ethan for a long time, but he only sees her as a friend--until a tourist named Lucas makes Ethan see Mackenzie in a new light.

programme.title: The Dance
programme.desc: A poignant comedy-drama about the intricacies of love and romance. For three couples one night will change everything!

programme.title: Dance Together
programme.desc: An injured dancer and a shy deaf girl overcome bullies, disability stigma, and other high school obstacles, developing a beautiful friendship amidst original and licensed songs and stunning choreography.

Mackenzie has loved Ethan for a long time, but he only sees her as a friend--until a tourist named Lucas makes Ethan see Mackenzie in a new light.

programme.title: Heart of the Manor
programme.desc: On the eve of her sister's wedding, Real Estate agent Lisa Bentron finds herself in competition with handsome developer Matthew Wallace when he wants to buy her family's historic estate. But could he hold the key to Liz's heart?
